Text: RE Move to EGAS EB Cc Thanks Loretta FYI I was told that it was ok for me to stay here on the th So unless anyone else has been assigned this work space I should be ok Please advise Regards Pravas X Original Message From Brelsford Loretta Sent Wednesday January AM To Sud Pravas Subject Move to EGAS EB Pravas The move for this weekend has been submitted and cannot be changed Ive talked to the head of the move group She is aware that you are in and will not be moving until later This is fine Next week well schedule your move Ill talk to you then about what youll be moving and where Thanks Loretta x
